pros: A good working environment, friendly and good customer service.

job_title: Office Administrator in North Walsham, England
pros: Everyone is very welcoming, kind and eager to help you learn. The office is a great environment to work in and there's lots of things to get involved in and try. You're not treated differently because you're young or new and your opinions/ideas are valued too. Overall, really comfortable workplace which seems too good to be true.
cons: Nothing comes to mind as of yet, which says a lot!

review_title: Good place to work and would recommend highly.

Great hours and other benefits such as 'own clothe' work dress code.
cons: At times, it can be cold in the office and or studio.
